title: Remains To Be Seen
description: REMAINS TO BE SEEN begins when two women fall from the thirteenth floor of The Palace, an all-suite four star hotel in West Hollywood. One of the women loses her life, the other one awakes in a hospital room with no knowledge of how she got there. Ivy uncovers a secret that her murdered mother never intended for her to discover. It is this secret that manages to both unhinge everything in her mundane life and enable her to start over with a clean slate.
author: Brandi L. Bates
